name: siyuan
tagline: A block based personal knowledge management app
description: SiYuan is a privacy-friendly, self-hosted note-taking and personal knowledge management app. It offers block-based editing, graph views, and sync across devices via desktop and web clients.

features.title: Block
features.description: Treats every paragraph, heading, and element as a referenceable block

features.title: Bidirectional Links
features.description: Creates connections between notes with automatic backlink tracking

features.title: Graph Visualization
features.description: Displays note relationships in interactive knowledge graphs

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Synchronizes notes across desktop and mobile devices via cloud or WebDAV

features.title: Version History
features.description: Tracks changes with snapshots and allows rollback to previous versions

features.title: Template System
features.description: Creates reusable templates for consistent note structure

features.title: Database Views
features.description: Queries and displays note data in tables, lists, and galleries

features.title: Flashcards
features.description: Generates spaced repetition flashcards from note content for learning
